name: Archeholder
description:
Archeholder is an action arcade game.

Evil robbers continue to seize territories and scare civilians
the nearest village. The brave archer volunteered to liberate the nearby forests from enemies and
bring peace to their native lands.

Kill enemies while surviving endless waves.
Buy new bows and shields to fight robbers more effectively.
Survive as many waves as possible and set a record!

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Random level generation.
- Shop with weapons.
